original_text: For I was afraid of the anger and hot displeasure that the Lord bore against you, so that he was ready to destroy you. But the Lord listened to me that time also.
korean_text: 여호와께서 심히 분노하사 너희를 멸하려 하셨으므로 내가 두려워하였노라 그러나 여호와께서 그 때에도 내 말을 들으셨고

sentences.original_text: For I was afraid of the anger and hot displeasure
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 주의 진노와 맹렬한 분노를 두려워했으니
